name: Public Speaking
challenges: Get comfortable speaking aloud. Read one article out loud one a day.
Read something you've enjoyed to friends/family.
Attend a meetup based around public speaking and deliver a talk to them.

name: Open Water
challenges: Get swimming. If you can't, take lessons. Otherwise grow confidence in a pool.

name: Socializing
challenges: Read passages from 'Feel the Fear and Do It Anyway' that jump out to you.
When you buy something from a shop, make light conversation with the cashier.
Attend a meetup. Board game meetups are very friendly and easy-going.
